name: Bronze Boss Blitz Chest
description: Double-click to open.

name: Festival Token
description: Redeemable in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for various rewards and prizes.

name: Unidentified Purple Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common Dye from the Purple spectrum.

name: Phoenix Short Bow Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other short bow.

name: Phoenix Axe Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other axe.

name: Unidentified Gray Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Gray spectrum.

name: Gauntlet Chance
description: Double-click to open for a festival token and a chance at a rare reward.

name: Bounty of the Festival
description: Contains 1 Favor of the Festival and 1600 Festival Tokens. Use this wealth to purchase fabulous rewards in the Labyrinthine Cliffs or the Crown Pavilion.

name: Unidentified Gray Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common Dye from the Gray spectrum.

name: Unidentified Brown Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Brown spectrum.

name: Water Fight Balloon Bucket
description: <c=@abilitytype>Costume Brawl Toy:</c> Double-click to equip a bundle which grants fun costume brawl skills. Brawl skills will only hit other players also using costume brawl.

name: Gold Boss Blitz Chest
description: Double-click to open.

name: Unidentified Brown Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common Dye from the Brown spectrum.

name: Unidentified Red Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common Dye from the Red spectrum.

name: Favor of the Pavilion
description: Double-click to combine a Favor of the Bazaar with a Favor of the Pavilion to create a Favor of the Festival.

name: Equipment Bag
description: Double-click to open. Contains a single piece of masterwork or better gear.

name: Mini Panda
description: Double-click to summon this miniature to follow you around. Only one miniature may be in use at a time.

name: Phoenix Shield Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other shield.

name: Phoenix Hammer Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other hammer.

name: Phoenix Sword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other sword.

name: Unidentified Blue Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common, Uncommon or Rare Dye from the Blue spectrum.

name: WvW Spring Tournament 2014 Reward Chest (Unlocked)
description:
Contains rewards based on your world's performance in the previous WvW season.
Double-click to open.

name: Musical Lute
description:
Double-click to change your skill bar, allowing you to play music for all those nearby.

Cannot be used in combat.

name: Phoenix Rifle Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other rifle.

name: WvW Spring Tournament 2014 Reward Chest (Unlocked)
description:
Contains rewards based on your world's performance in the previous WvW season.
Double-click to open.

name: Ancestral Outfit
description:
Double-click to wear this outfit.

Outfits are full sets of clothing that hide other armor. This will not change individual armor pieces, and you will still receive your current armor stats.

name: Unidentified Green Dye
description: Double-click to identify a Common Dye from the Green spectrum.

name: Phoenix Greatsword Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other greatsword.

name: Favor of the Festival
description: Redeemable in the Labyrinthine Cliffs for a fabulous festival reward or in the Crown Pavilion for a Sovereign Weapon Skin. This item can be created by combining a Favor of the Bazaar and a Favor of the Pavilion.

name: Endless Dolyak Calf Tonic
description: Double-click to transform into a dolyak calf for fifteen minutes. You will be unable to fight while transformed.

name: Phoenix Focus Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other focus.

name: Phoenix Mace Skin
description: Double-click to apply this look to any other mace.
